channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: Obsidian Age Encrypt
item.description:
Obsidian Age Encrypt

A plugin for Obsidian that provides age-based encryption for your notes. - Mr-1311/obsidian-age-encrypt
Another one of those notes encryption plugin for Obsidian.
item.content:encoded:
Obsidian Age Encrypt

A plugin for Obsidian that provides age-based encryption for your notes. - Mr-1311/obsidian-age-encrypt
Another one of those notes encryption plugin for Obsidian.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JMRYRKX4TQWZ76W664TP0E6Z
item.description:
When my media stack was hosted in #GreenCloudVPS, never did encounter problems. But with #EvosHosting, it was never reliable.

You ask why?

  1. Downtime happens from time to time
  2. Subscription is on a monthly basis only (no annual). They’re not even sure they can delivery their services reliably on the long term
  3. Auto-paying their invoices monthly via Paypal is not working at all. You need to remember to pay your invoices manually every month.
item.content:encoded:
When my media stack was hosted in #GreenCloudVPS, never did encounter problems. But with #EvosHosting, it was never reliable.

You ask why?

  1. Downtime happens from time to time
  2. Subscription is on a monthly basis only (no annual). They’re not even sure they can delivery their services reliably on the long term
  3. Auto-paying their invoices monthly via Paypal is not working at all. You need to remember to pay your invoices manually every month.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JMRYPGD42D9WK2M5G0TD8BY3
item.description: Just when #Reacher Season 3 became exciting (at least compared to Season 2), then Amazon decided to release them in installment (1 per week).
item.content:encoded: Just when #Reacher Season 3 became exciting (at least compared to Season 2), then Amazon decided to release them in installment (1 per week).

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JMRYCDV681CGV0WDYVWVNT3X
item.description: Will people in the #Fediverse take you more seriously if you’re running your own Fediverse instance, may it be #Mastodon or #GoToSocial?
item.content:encoded: Will people in the #Fediverse take you more seriously if you’re running your own Fediverse instance, may it be #Mastodon or #GoToSocial?

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JMRXB8NCVPK1TC2DCY38BWGS
item.description:
Running now #GoToSocial 0.18.0. Number 1 improvement is the ability to edit posts. No. 2 is push notification, via #Ntfy though, not #Pushover?

Testing Edit now. –> Hey it worked!
item.content:encoded:
Running now #GoToSocial 0.18.0. Number 1 improvement is the ability to edit posts. No. 2 is push notification, via #Ntfy though, not #Pushover?

Testing Edit now. –> Hey it worked!

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lirpbmgtgc2e
item.description: Finished transferring #UptimeKuma to one of my trusted VPS. Now, I’m free to play around with the old VPS.
item.content:encoded: Finished transferring #UptimeKuma to one of my trusted VPS. Now, I’m free to play around with the old VPS.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JMGG1QY9YDA58EETKNTE7AFF
item.description: I give up on #Authelia. Why can’t it just come up with a very basic configuration for a very basic purpose like if you just want a simple username and password security for some of your services? Why complicate everything from the start? Any suggestion for alternatives please?
item.content:encoded: I give up on #Authelia. Why can’t it just come up with a very basic configuration for a very basic purpose like if you just want a simple username and password security for some of your services? Why complicate everything from the start? Any suggestion for alternatives please?

item.title: Maverick Hugo Theme
item.description:
Maverick Hugo Theme

Maverick is a minimal Hugo blog theme with introduction page and based on Listed by Ronalds Vilciņš. This Hugo theme features several content sections, front page, dynamic pages creation and a Github comment.
Another option for my future Hugo projects.
item.content:encoded:
Maverick Hugo Theme

Maverick is a minimal Hugo blog theme with introduction page and based on Listed by Ronalds Vilciņš. This Hugo theme features several content sections, front page, dynamic pages creation and a Github comment.
Another option for my future Hugo projects.

item.title: Tree
item.description:
Tree

An online tree-like utility for generating ASCII folder structure diagrams. Written in TypeScript and React.
Here’s an alternative to the tree app and command in Linux.
item.content:encoded:
Tree

An online tree-like utility for generating ASCII folder structure diagrams. Written in TypeScript and React.
Here’s an alternative to the tree app and command in Linux.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JMF6SMSMDV8125FDKFHMCCYM
item.description: @gohugoio #GoHugo appears to be releasing updates at a rapid pace lately.
